mdRecord.dcterms:title: Britannia Wellington Kennon Peter
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, No. 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, P. O. Box 655, Washington, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mrs. Britannia Peter Kennon poses near the south porch of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. The reverse of the photograph includes notes by Superintendent Charles Cecil Wall written in 1967 making references to physical changes found in the photograph and the corresponding MVLA Minutes...brick pavement under porch; wooden (?) under colonnade columns; removal of locust tree 1903/04.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kennon, Britannia Wellington Peter, 1815-1911
